creditline: Gift of the Joseph F. McCrindle Collection
description: two standing figures at L flogging a crouching figure at center; two standing figures at R
markings: Watermark: six-pointed star above a fleur-de-lis in a circle (cropped); close to Heawood 1575 (Venice, 1571) and Heawood 1574 (1561, also Rome, ca. 1580); also close to Briquet 7116 (Florence 1536) and Briquet 7117 (Ascoli 1536)
medium: Pen and brown ink and wash and black chalk
provenance: Joseph F. McCrindle (until d. 2008); Joseph F. McCrindle Foundation (2008-2009; gave to MIA)
title: Martyrdom of Saint John the Baptist
